ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I m having major probs. installing cantera , on an SGI origin 200 (server class system) running SGI Irix 6.5.6 w/ gnu compilers, v. 3.3.2, gcc, g++, g77,

Subject: problems Installing cantera-1.5.2 on SGI Irix (Irix 6.5.6) w/gnu 3.2.2 compilers
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=174922985

Hi,

I'm having major probs. installing "cantera", on an SGI origin 200
(server class system) running SGI Irix 6.5.6 w/ gnu compilers, v.
3.3.2, gcc, g++, g77, and having "python" 2.3.3, w/ Numeric 2.3-1, and
matlab 6.2.

After a lot of "tweaking" (eliminating "ranlib" calls to various
"makefiles) - the "gmake  OPT=" fails in the "build" Python phase. 

I'm trying to install it to an alternate directory
(/usr/freeware/cantera/...   (from /usr/freeware/cantera-1.5.2 )

output of "gmake" below:
.....

-Wstrict-prototypes -shared -I../../build/include -Isrc -I../clib/src
